sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
invalidates an argument, conclusion, or result
, dokaže, da je neka trditev, sklep ali izid nepravilen.

seg.quote: Such exceptions do not invalidate the rule.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
invalidates an official process, contract, or document
, naredi uradni postopek, pogodbo ali listino zakonsko nesprejemljivo.

seg.quote: The marriage would invalidate any earlier will.
